api_output.description: xml, json, or serialize (default is XML)

filters.description: Filter: Perform a pattern match (LIKE) for List Name.

full.description: Whether or not to return ALL data, or an abbreviated portion (set to 1 for ALL data, and 0 for abbreviated).

global_fields.description: Whether or not to include global custom fields.

ids.description: A comma-separated list of subscription form ID's of lists you wish to view. Pass "all" to view all lists.
